common

Class MyCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.MyCalendar

  • public class MyCalendar
extends java.lang.Object
    MyCalendar 日期物件
    本程式參考自Sean Lin (林洵賢)先生的農曆月曆與世界時間DHTML程式(AD1900至AD2100)
    http://sean.o4u.com/2008/04/dhtml.html

    The program is inspired by Sean Lin DHTML web page:
    http://sean.o4u.com/2008/04/dhtml.html
    Author:
    Roy Tsang
